projects.title: FixMyRide-Smart Roadside Assistance & Vehicle Repair
projects.bodyText:
- AI-powered roadside help with real-time issue detection for highways & remote areas.
 - Emergency services like towing, fuel, and SOS alerts tailored for women's safety.
 - Includes AI chatbots, GPS support, cost estimations, and IoT-based accident detection.

projects.title: College Navigation System
projects.bodyText:
- Seamless indoor and outdoor navigation using Mapbox and Leaflet.js
- 3D model-enhanced interactive map of entire college campus
- Smart AI search using Fuse.js and detailed faculty directory
- Live routing, event integration, and mobile-friendly interface

projects.title: No-Password – Secure Password Manager
projects.bodyText:
- Built a secure password manager with Clerk-based authentication
- Encrypted storage for social media and credit/debit card credentials
- User-friendly dashboard for managing stored credentials with ease
- Fully responsive UI with seamless cross-device compatibility
- Focused on privacy-first design and strong data protection practices

projects.title: NagarSuraksha-Government Collaboration App
projects.bodyText:
- Enabled cross-agency coordination to reduce project overlap
- Real-time updates on public infrastructure projects
- Area-based tracking and project deadline alerts
- Improved public transparency and resource efficiency

projects.title: Job Portal
projects.bodyText:
- Full-featured job portal with user and employer roles
- Job search, application, and posting capabilities
- Secure authentication and authorization system
- Responsive dashboard for both job seekers and recruiters

projects.title: Solar System Explorer – 3D Interactive Space Simulation
projects.bodyText:
- Real-time physics-based planetary motion with dynamic sunlight and shadows
- Explore planets with smooth camera controls and zoomable views
- High-resolution textures and realistic space environment
- Interactive UI allows users to learn more about each celestial body

projects.title: LuxeStay – Smart Hotel Booking Platform
projects.bodyText:
- AI-powered personalized hotel recommendations with real-time pricing
- Smooth, secure, and elegant booking flow with mobile optimization
- Advanced filtering, interactive maps, and user reviews for smarter decisions
- Secure authentication and loyalty reward system for user engagement

projects.title: Food Delivery App
projects.bodyText:
- AI-driven food recommendations with real-time order tracking
- Integrated dietary filters for personalized experience
- Secure payment gateway and seamless restaurant discovery
- Clean, responsive UI with intuitive navigation

projects.title: Bag Haven – Smart E-commerce Platform for Bags
projects.bodyText:
- AI-powered product recommendations and dynamic filtering with Fuse.js
- Owner dashboard for managing products, inventory, and discounts
- JWT-based secure authentication with intuitive login/signup system
- Smooth cart functionality and real-time stock updates

projects.title: Ride Sharing App
projects.bodyText:
- AI-powered ride matching with real-time driver tracking
- Secure login and user authentication using JWT
- Flexible payment options and multi-city ride support
- Clean, responsive UI with seamless user experience
- Driver and rider dashboards for managing trips and profiles

projects.title: Blender 3D Models Showcase
projects.bodyText:
- A curated collection of 3D models designed using Blender
- Includes architectural, mechanical, and creative assets
- Demonstrates skills in modeling, lighting, texturing, and animation
- Compiled into a visual reel for easy viewing
